modName: Living NPCs With Golden Armor Standalone
summary: Adds golden armor to the game and some living npcs
descriptionHtml:
Adds golden armor to the game. And Living Npcs.
The Knights travel in Skyrim from 4AM to 10PM, then they usually go to Riverwood Bedroll and Sleep there. -Weekdays-
In weekends the knights travel in to a town or a city and interact with objects in it randomly from 4AM to 10PM, then comes back to Riverwood to sleep.
Travelers travels broadly in Tamriel in every moment.
Added hostile Npcs called \'Ancient Nord Giant\' they usually attacks forts or towns, but don\'t worry, travelers will defend the town.
The Golden Armor is not Craftable, but Upgradable(Temperable)
The Golden Armor can be taken by defeating the \'Knight of Wealth\' which is one of the npcs described above (He is Strong! but not insanely strong)
Future Plans for this mod is to add some quest (when I get good enough), add more items, and add more npcs
It is compatible with any mod. highly recommended to use with Wars In Skyrim (for spawn rates and more fights, optional)
author: Parkj
